file.name: provide-summary.yaml
file.content:
openapi: "3.0.1"
info:
  version: 1.0.0
  title: Swagger Petstore
paths:
  /pets:
    post:             # Noncompliant {{Provide a summary for each operation.}}
      responses:
        default:
          description: the default response
    get:
      summary: list all pets
      responses:
        default:
          description: the default response
